original_text: You see that faith was active along with his works, and faith was completed by his works;
korean_text: 네가 보거니와 믿음이 그의 행함과 함께 일하고 행함으로 믿음이 온전하게 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: You see that faith was active along with his works
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 보다시피 믿음은 그의 행함과 함께 역사했고

sentences.original_text: and faith was completed by his works
